name: gamevault
tagline: A self-hosted game launcher and library manager
description: GameVault is a self-hosted gaming launcher and library manager. It scans games, provides metadata, launch buttons, and remote play support. Supports Windows and Linux builds, with a slick UI for organizing your collection.

features.title: Game Library Management
features.description: Organizes and catalogs personal game collections

features.title: Download Management
features.description: Downloads and stores game files centrally

features.title: Client Applications
features.description: Provides desktop clients for accessing games

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Stores game descriptions and cover art

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages the library through a browser

features.title: Self-Hosted Game Library
features.description: Run the platform on your own infrastructure
